name: EverythingInItsRightPlace
description:
My first attempt at a rhythm game. Use any key or the mouse to catch the "notes".

The song is "Everything In Its Right Place" by Radiohead. It was stuck in my head for days, which made me want to try this.

I found a good trick to place the "notes" using markers in Audacity, which you can then export as a text file.
